reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Obsessive Compulsive over your Hardwoods?
reviews.reviewText: Let me be frank. My house is a disaster. We have 3 kids, 6 large dogs, two cats, a pair of birds, and it’s 6000 square feet of hardwood floors that I’m mopping constantly. These are great for preventing sneaker prints on the still wet floor when you inevitably forget your wine glass on the other side of the room. You’ll actually be able to appreciate how beautiful hardwoods really are for the 12.3 seconds you get before something comes in muddy, dripping, sticky, or leaking on them.Also, apparently makes a great dog toy when one of them fishes it out of the laundry basket full of clean dish towels and cleaning rags that you asked your kids to put away....Pros: Fun colors, launder well, not slippery, pets enjoy ripping them apartCons: Small (won’t cover 16 year old son or husband’s shoes...so probably designed by a man), doesn’t come in a style I can make my dogs wear.Overall: If you hate leaving foot prints in your freshly mopped floors, I’d definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cutest White Elephant Gift
reviews.reviewText: Got a pack of these for a white elephant party. I kept two for my house. They’re funny to wear and keep my feet warm while walking around the house.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The kids love them as they get to did in the floor and doing chores in a fun way. As an adult tho, you have to be wary of how slippery they can be. They are washable and fit in shoes or on bare feet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It does work!
reviews.reviewText: Tried it today! It cleaned my laminated floors and collected all the dust! My only gripe it’s too small, company should add more of those microfiber hairs, and wearing two of these could cause a slippery accident.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is genius!
reviews.reviewText: I love these and wear them like slippers cleaning my floors! When they are dirty I just pop them into the wash! I gave them to my daughter and her daughters in-law as a stocking stuffer this Christmas!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars White elephant gag gift.
reviews.reviewText: Got these as a white elephant gag gift which my cousin ended up with, everyone got a kick out of them. My cousin mentioned months late that he actually uses them to clean up spills in the kitchen and they work great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Floor washing slippers
reviews.reviewText: One of my pet peeve's is when I am washing the floor and my own slipper makes a step mark where I just washed! ( Ok lets wash over the mark again!) I Bissell my floor with the crosswave wet vac every night in lieu of sweeping. In the past I used a towel under my feet and slid along not to leave foot marks. These Duster Mop Slippers take the place of my towel, and make my life a little bit easier :) Hubby calls them my clown shoes :), I have washed them, and hang dry on my Bissell machine so they are ready for the next day. No more step marks where I JUST washed the floor! I do not see them as great floor dusters. BUT they are great to use while washing the floor. They absorb extra water, and in most cases i can use my toe with the slipper to loosen up those stuck on spots. Yes I would by them again, and recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Funny white elephant gift
reviews.reviewText: The hit of the party….i think people really wanted to wear them
Yo dejo mis zapatos en la entrada de mi casa, me pongo los M-jump y me facilita la limpieza en general. Igual cuando derramo algún líquido solo lo paso encima y listo.

reviews.reviewTitle: Que trato de regalarlas a otras personas para que las compren
reviews.reviewText: Me gusta mucho el producto porque tengo tres perritas y me las pongo todo el día y levantan muy bien su pelo, pelusas y polvo
Un poco caros para lo que son, pero una alternativa muy divertida y diferente
